movie-description: A series of high-ranking officials are being systematically eliminated by a sleek assassin and his female assistant, and arrogant master swordsman General Choi is charged with putting an end to the carnage.
movie-short-description: Directed by Ui-Seok Kim.  With Min-su Choi, Jae-Hyun Cho, Bo-kyeong Kim, Jong-su Lee. A series of high-ranking officials are being systematically eliminated by a sleek assassin and his female assistant, and arrogant master swordsman General Choi is charged with putting an end to the carnage.
